name: World of Tanks 3D Model File
summary: Learn about .PRIMITIVES_PROCESSED files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can convert WoT models to the Wavefront 3D Object format with the World of Tanks Model Converter script. The PRIMITIVES_PROCESSED and .VISUAL_PROCESSED files are required in order to create the .OBJ or .MTL file. You can also open the PRIMITIVES_PROCESSED file with the 3D Object Converter and convert it to more common 3D formats such as .STL, .DXF, or .3DS.

description: 3D Model file format used by World of Tanks (WoT), a war game featuring battles between tanks and other armored vehicles; stores information about a 3D model, such as a tank or other armored vehicle; replaced the .PRIMITIVES format with the release of WoT 0.9.10.
